name: STO Home page rework
description:
Reworked STO home page so it's easier to read. Newest stuff up top, older as it goes down. Removed annoying videos and news carousel.
Option in code (just uncomment "body" section up top) to revert back to pre 2013 STO Enterprise background
additional_info:
4/3/14 - Initial Release
1/5/14 - Fixed long titles of news segments breaking format. Titles are now width limited
9/7/14 - Fixed the URL of the News page this applies to. PWE altered the URL.
11/9/14 - Lengthened nav bar as Delta Pack link was added.
12/1/15 - Fixed news item blocks to format correctly and positioned new social and author items
20/3/15 - Cryptic altered a h4 heading to a h2. Changed code to match.
29/4/16 - Reduced each news item's height some more via minor elements re-arrangement. Reduced mouse-over border widths. Also added code (that you can uncomment to enable, see "body" up top of code) to get pre 2013 original STO Enterprise background. Fixed ARC download link removal code.
10/5/16 - Removed new "platform" tab. Serves no purpose, PC master race!
